# OpenCog Component Integrations
# Generated by integration script

# atomspace-rocks integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/core/atomspace-rocks/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/core/atomspace-rocks)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(atomspace-rocks atomspace)
endif()

# atomspace-restful integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/core/atomspace-restful/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/core/atomspace-restful)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(atomspace-restful atomspace)
endif()

# moses integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/learning/moses/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/learning/moses)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(moses cogutil)
endif()
